title: Larryboy - The Cartoon Adventures - The Good, the Bad and the Eggly
description: Crime mavens Awful Alvin, Greta Von Gruesome and Lampy join evil forces to steal a top-secret, over-easy egg raygun, with the plan of turning all of Bumblyburg into over-easy eggs. To make matters worse, Larryboy and fellow superhero, the Dark Crow can't seem to agree to work together. Will Bumblyburg turn into one giant omelet? Or will Larryboy and the Dark Crow learn that when you work together, you can accomplish many things you cannot do alone? Find out in the cartoon adventures of Larryboy, The Good, The Bad and The Eggly.
